abstract: Four European financial institutions will stand trial for their handling of interest rate swaps acquired by the city of Milan.
snippet: Four European financial institutions will stand trial for their handling of interest rate swaps acquired by the city of Milan.
lead_paragraph: MILAN — An Italian judge Wednesday ordered JPMorgan Chase, Deutsche Bank, UBS and a banking unit of the German company Hypo Real Estate Holding to stand trial for fraud in their handling of interest rate swaps acquired by the city of Milan in 2005.

headline.main: Banks Face Fraud Charges in Deals Involving Milan’s Debt
headline.print_headline: Banks Face Fraud Charges in Deals Involving Milan’s Debt
